abstract: Ms. Couric has landed the first television interview with the Notre Dame football star, who said he was tricked into believing first that he had a girlfriend and then that the girlfriend had died.
snippet: Ms. Couric has landed the first television interview with the Notre Dame football star, who said he was tricked into believing first that he had a girlfriend and then that the girlfriend had died.
lead_paragraph: 1:42 p.m. | Updated Katie Couric has landed the first television interview with Manti Te’o, the Notre Dame football star who said he was tricked into believing first that he had a girlfriend and then that the girlfriend died of leukemia. The girlfriend never existed.

headline.main: Katie Couric to Interview Manti Te’o
